resources.string: Your password must be at least 8 characters and should include a combination of numbers, letters and special characters.
Vision \n A premier Science and Technology University for the formation of world-class virtuous human resource for sustainable development in Bohol and the country.

Mission \n BISU is committed to provide quality higher education in the arts and sciences, as well as in the professional and technological fields; undertake research and development and extension services for the sustainable development in Bohol and the country.
